import { connect } from "react-redux" import { Component } from "react" import { withRouter } from "react-router-dom" import { Button, Form, Row, Col } from "react-bootstrap" import { Props, KKData as State } from '../../interface/Interfaces' import { mapDispatchToProps, mapStateToProps } from "../../app/functions" import Result from './Result' class InputKk extends Component { default = { no_kk: '', family_head: '', rt_rw: '', village: 'DOMAS', distric: 'PONTANG', city: 'SERANG', zip: '42192', province: 'BANTEN' } constructor(props: Props){ super(props) const { no_kk, family_head, rt_rw, village, distric, city, zip, province } = this.default this.state = { no_kk, family_head, rt_rw, village, distric, city, zip, province } } changerData = (e: any) => { const { name, value } = e.target this.setState({ [name]: value }) } submit = () => { console.log(this.state) } render = () => { return( <>

) } } export default withRouter(connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(InputKk))
